EmailTemplate.name: Alliance Reg Status Approved Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic - {!Alliance_Registration__c.Customer_Account_Name__c} Registration Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Alliance_Registration__c.Partner_First_Name_Capitalized__c},
The registration for {!Alliance_Registration__c.Customer_Account_Name__c} was approved.
Please reach out to your Turbonomic sales team for assistance with the opportunity.
Regards,
The Turbo Team
